EmailTemplate.name: NPS Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: How are we doing?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We can't help drive revenue if we don't hear back from you.
Please take 1-minute survey to tell NODE.IO how we are doing! https://goo.gl/forms/Wms42v528O8zzTtw2
THANK YOU!
Bests,
{!Success_Plan__c.CreatedBy} Node, Customer Success Group
